src:
Cedera Bahu, Kiper Persela Harus Istirahat Selama Tiga Hari
01 Nov 2019, 14:03 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penjaga gawang Persela Lamongan, Dwi Kuswanto menjadi 'tumbal' atas hasil imbang kontra Bali United, Kamis (31/10/2019) malam. Dwi Kus mengalami cedera bahu akibat benturan dengan rekannya, Arif Satria.
Dwi Kus mengalami benturan dengan Arif saat mencoba menghalau tendangan bebas dari Bali United. Dia pun harus ditandu keluar lapangan dan digantikan Dian Agus Prasetyo pada menit 58'.
Setelah pertandingan, mantan kiper Arema FC tersebut kemudian dilarikan ke RSU Gianyar untuk pemeriksaan lebih lanjut. Beruntung, cederanya tidak terlalu parah dan langsung kembali ke hotel.
"Dibawa ke IGD untuk x-ray shoulder (bahu). Hasilnya enggak apa-apa, cuma strain otot bahu kanan," kata Hasyim, tim medis Persela, kepada Bola.net, Jumat (01/11/2019).
Hanya saja, akibat dari cederanya itu, pemain kelahiran Sidoarjo tersebut harus menepi selama kurang lebih tiga hari untuk proses pemulihan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Shoulder Injury, Goalkeeper Persela Must Rest For Three Days
Nov 01 2019, 14:03 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela goalkeeper Lamongan, Dwi Kuswanto became a 'victim' of the draw against Bali United, Thursday (10/31/2019) night. Dwi Kus suffered a shoulder injury due to collision with his colleague, Arif Satria.
Dwi Kus experienced a collision with Arif when trying to block a free kick from Bali United. He also had to be stretchered off the field and replaced by Dian Agus Prasetyo at minute 58 '.
After the match, the former Arema FC goalkeeper was then rushed to Gianyar Hospital for further examination. Luckily, the injury was not too severe and went straight back to the hotel.
"Taken to the emergency room for x-ray shoulder (shoulder). The result is nothing, just a strain of the right shoulder muscle," said Hasyim, Persela's medical team, told Bola.net, Friday (01/11/2019).
However, as a result of the injury, the Sidoarjo-born player had to pull over for about three days for the recovery process.
